mapper.select: SELECT l.id,l.systemid,l.provinceid,l.cityid,l.areaid,l.positionx,l.positiony,l.name,l.describes, p.name AS provincename,c.name AS cityname,a.name AS areaname,s.name AS systemname,s.pic AS pic FROM location l LEFT JOIN province p ON l.provinceid = p.provinceid LEFT JOIN city c ON l.cityid = c.cityid LEFT JOIN area a ON l.areaid = a.areaid LEFT JOIN system s ON l.systemid = s.id WHERE l.id = ${_parameter}
